title: Schema for DENO_AUDIT_PERMISSIONS
description: The schema of a single line of the DENO_AUDIT_PERMISSIONS file output.

v.description: The version of the schema this value is for.

datetime.description: The datetime the permission was accessed.

value.description: The value of the permission that was accessed.

stack.description: The stacktrace of where this access was requested. Requires DENO_TRACE_PERMISSIONS to be set.
